Translations.Text: basa! Temane ame sapata medanamam nankhi didha ane te'o te samaye bimara hata
ane temana para chanyado karava mate eka velavalum vrksa ame ugadi didhum
ane ame temane eka lakha karatam pana vadhare loko tarapha mokalya
basa! Te'o imana lavya ane ame temane eka samayagala sudhi vaibhavi jivana apyum
temane pucho ke sum tamara palanaharane dikari'o che ane temana dikara che
athava a loko te samaye hajara hata, jyare ame pharista'onum sarjana strijatimam karyum
jani lo, ke a loko pote ghadi kadheli vato kahi rahya che
ke allahane santana che, kharekhara a loko juththa che
sum allaha ta'ala'e potana mate dikari'one dikara'o para prathamikata api
tamane sum tha'i gayum che? Kevi vato kaheta pharo cho
sum tame samajata pana nathi
athava tamari pase a vatano ko'i spasta puravo che
to java, saca hova to potani ja kitaba la'i avo
Ane te loko'e allaha ane jinnata vacce sambandha theravyo, jo ke jinnato pote jane che ke te'o (avi astha rakhanara loko)yatana same raju karavamam avase
je kami a loko varnana kari rahya che tenathi allaha ta'ala pavitra che
allahana nikhalasa banda'o sivaya
kharekhara tame sau ane tamara pujyo
ko'i ekane pana pathabhrasta kari nathi sakata
je jahannamamam rahevavalo che tena sivaya
(pharista'oni vata evi che ke) amara manthi darekani jagya nakki che
ane ame (allahani bandagi mate) la'inabandha ubha che
ane tena namanum smarana kari rahya che
inkara karanara kaheta hata
ke jo amari same pahelana lokonum varnana karavamam avatum
to ame pana allahana nikatana banda bani jatam
parantu a kura'anano inkara karava lagya, basa! Have najikamam ja jani lese
ane amarum vacana pahelathi ja potana payagambaro mate nakki tha'i gayum che
ke kharekhara te lokoni ja madada karavamam avase
ane amarum ja laskara vijaya melavase
have tame thodanka divasa sudhi temanathi modhum pheravi lo
ane temane jota raho ane te loko pana agala jo'i lese
sum a loko amara prakopani utavala kari rahya che
sambhalo! Jyare amaro prakopa temana medanamam avi jase, te samaye temani savara khuba ja kharaba hase, je lokone saceta karavamam avya hata
tame thodoka samaya sudhi temano vicara karavanum chodi do
ane jota raho ke te loko pana hamana ja jo'i lese
pavitra che tamaro palanahara, je ghani ja ijajatavalo che, te dareka vastuthi (jenum musarika loko) varnana kare che
payagambaro para salama che
Ane dareka prakarani prasansa allaha mate ja che je samagra srstino palanahara che
so-d! A sikhamana apata kura'anana soganda
jo ke inkara karanara'o ahankara ane vivada kari rahya che
ame temanathi pahela pana ghani komone nasta kari didhi, te'o ciso padava lagya, parantu te samaya chutakarano na hato
ane inkara karanara'one e vata para asvarya thayum ke temana manthi ja eka, te'one saceta karanara avyo ane kaheva lagya ke a to jadugara ane juththo che
sum tene atala badha pujyono eka ja pujya kari didho, kharekhara a to asvaryajanaka vata che
temana agevano evum kahetam calava lagya ke, calo ane potana pujyo para adaga raho. Ni:Sanka a vata ko'i hetu mate kahevamam avi rahi che
ame to avi vata pahelana dinamam pana nathi sambhali, kami nathi basa! Ato ghadi kadheli vato che
sum apana manthi phakta ana para ja allahani vani avatarita karavamam avi? Jo ke a loko mari vahi para sanka kari rahya che, jo ke (satya e che ke) te loko'e haju sudhi maro prakopa cakhyo ja nathi
athava sum temani pase tara jabaradasta palanaharani krpana khajana che
athava sum akasa ane dharati ane te banne vacceni dareka vastuni badasahata temani ja che, pachi to te loko doradum bandhi cadhi jaya
a pana (mota mota) laskaro manthi hari gayelum (nanum) laskara che
temana pahela pana nuha ane adani koma ane khuntavala phira'aune juthalavya hata
ane samudana loko, lutani komana loko'e pana ane ayakahana rahevasi'o'e pana, a ja (mota) laskaro hata
temana manthi eka pana eva na hata jemane payagambarone na juthalavya hoya, basa! Mari yatana temana mate sabita tha'i ga'i
Te loko basa! Eka cisani raha jo'i rahya che, jemam thodika pana vara nahim lage
ane te loko'e kahyum ke, he amara palanahara! Amane amaro bhaga kayamatana divasa pahela ja api de
tame temani vato para dhiraja rakho ane amara banda da'uda a.Sa.Ne yada karo, je khuba ja saktisali hata, ni:Sanka te khuba ja raju thanara hata
ame parvatone temana vasamam kari rakhya hata, ke temani sathe sanje ane savare allahana namanum smarana kare
ane paksi'one pana bhega tha'i, dareka temani ajnanum palana karata hata
ane ame temana samrajyane majabuta kari didhum hatum ane temane hikamata api hati ane nirnayaka sakti pana api hati
